oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Making emergencies suck less: Addressing a significant obstacle to retaining veterinarians in rural mixed-animal practice
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hillhouse, Joe
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: rural veterinary practice
emergency care
veterinarian retention
mixed-animal practice
rural challenges
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Veterinary practices in rural areas face unique challenges that can impact their efficiency, profitability and ability to retain staff. This paper examines common obstacles faced by rural mixed-animal veterinary practices â€“ after hours emergencies.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; Vol. 58 No. 58 (2024): 2024 AABP Annual Conference Proceedings; 121-122
